channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM Corporation -- DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM Corporation -- DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows

item.title: CVE-2017-1150|2024-08-05T13:25:17.274Z -- ibm%20corporation -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 could allow an authenticated attacker with specialized access to tables that they should not be permitted to view. IBM Reference #: 1999515.
